name: Puddi Jump: Kawaii Monsters
description:
◉ From the developers featured on the TOP 10 INDIE GAMES 2017 ◉

Little jellies need you more than ever! Jump higher, survive longer and stay on the correct platform!

Puddi Jump is an original color-based endless hopper, very easy to play but hard to master!

Jump up before the paint hides your platforms - or reveals the deadly traps!

-------- FEATURES --------

◉ Super fun and addictive casual jumping arcade
◉ Simple and intuitive TILT control
◉ More than 60 mochis to play with (explode balloons to collect all the jell!)
◉ Lots of color palettes to choose from :) Switch to your favorites!
◉ Achievements and leaderboards are integrated with Game Center. Battle your friends score!
◉ Special offers, jelly, puddings and gifts will be added with holidays updates: Easter, Halloween, Christmas and other limited time events!
◉ Great for children and adults alike <3

--------

Regarding In-App Purchases:
IAPs in the game are purely cosmetic.
No additional purchases are needed to finish the game.
◉ No internet connection needed.

--------

#HINT: Unlock Mochi Froggy and Mochi Pirate! They’re super cool *wink*wink*
Thanks to all of you who support our work! You are awesome and we truly love you! <3

--------

This game is made by a 2-person team so we really appreciate your feedback ^-^

We really hope you enjoy our game! We certainly had a blast making it. Even if you didn’t, we’d love to hear from you. Email us at info@platonicgames.com
Join our community and take part in great contests and giveaways!
Youtube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/c/Sweetsinsgame
Follow us on Twitter! https://twitter.com/PlatonicGames
Like us on Facebook: https://facebook.com/PlatonicGames

--------

So, if you like original time-wasters games with simple and addictive mechanics, you may enjoy playing Puddi Jump! :D

Let's play! ~~ ﾐ(o*･ω･)ﾉ
